title: The hospitall of incurable fooles: erected in English, as neer the first Italian modell and platforme, as the vnskilfull hand of an ignorant architect could deuise
author: Garzoni, Tomaso, 1549?-1589.
publisher: Printed by Edm. Bollifant, for Edward Blount,
notes: Translation of: Garzoni, Tomaso.  L'hospidale de' pazzi incurabili.
Possibly translated by Edward Blount; translation also sometimes ascribed to Thomas Nash.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
